Package main

Class Program

java.lang.Object
main.Program
public class Program
extends java.lang.Object
Provides a console based application to run the Quick Food Order System. The following functionality is provided: - Create a new order - Find an existing customer - Create a new customer - Update an existing customer - Find incomplete orders - Finalise an order - Find an existing order
Author:
donnp

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void CreateNewOrder()
    Creates a new order and inserts the order into the database.

    Asks the user if he/she wants to do another transaction

    Run the main program loop.
